data.name: Beware Of The Swarm Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a 15-30 minute demo for a game in development. Beware of the Swarm is a Space Dogfighter in Room Scale VR. Learn to fly a spaceship using motion controllers, and progress through a few waves of enemies defending resources.

In the full game you progress through a single-player campaign defending humanity from a powerful alien foe known as “the Swarm.” Beware of the Swarm is being designed for players using the HTC Vive or the Oculus Rift with Touch controllers. You control the direction and movement of your space ship using these motion controllers. These special VR controllers also operate your offensive weapons.
data.about_the_game:

In the full game you progress through a single-player campaign defending humanity from a powerful alien foe known as “the Swarm.” Beware of the Swarm is being designed for players using the HTC Vive or the Oculus Rift with Touch controllers. You control the direction and movement of your space ship using these motion controllers. These special VR controllers also operate your offensive weapons.
data.short_description: This is a demo of a game in development. Beware of the swarm is a Spaceflight Dog fighter in VR, where you defend earth from an alien invasion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690K @ 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • Storage: 746 MB available space
